plot: While investigating the murder of his partner, Detective Joe Bauer must team up with the unpredictable rookie Buddy Callahan, who doesn't play by the rules and is also a llama.
plot_en: While investigating the murder of his partner, Detective Joe Bauer must team up with the unpredictable rookie Buddy Callahan, who doesn't play by the rules and is also a llama.
plot_es: While investigating the murder of his partner, Detective Joe Bauer must team up with the unpredictable rookie Buddy Callahan, who doesn't play by the rules and is also a llama.
title: Llama Cop
